comment.author: 78653807@N08
comment._content: Brooklyn Museum, I have chosen this image for use in a site-specific art installation entitled "Atlantis," which will be open to the public during the Columbus (Ohio) Arts Festival on June 1,2,3, 2012. My art makes lyrical connections between ancient ruins and rust belt industrial relics. Thank you for being such a rich resource. Mona Gazala monagazala.webs.com/exhibitions.htm

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Hi Mona -- thanks for letting us know! 
We'd love to see some pix of you installation when it's done.
Deb Wythe
Brooklyn Museum Digital Lab
